abstract: Authorities in Philadelphia charge daughter Jean McIntosh as participant in mother Linda Weston's crime of holding four mentally disabled adults captive and stealing their Social Security checks.
snippet: Authorities charged the daughter of Linda Weston, the woman arrested and accused of holding four mentally disabled adults captive and stealing their Social Security checks, as a participant in the crime.
lead_paragraph: Authorities charged the daughter of Linda Weston, the woman arrested and accused of holding four mentally disabled adults captive and stealing their Social Security checks, as a participant in the crime.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Second Woman Arrested in Case of Mentally Disabled Captives
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Second Woman Arrested In Case of Mentally Disabled Captives
headline.seo: In Pennsylvania, Second Woman Arrested in Case of Mentally Disabled Captives
